law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall hold a hearing on an application for a temporary variance on request of:...

text.section:
The Commissioner shall hold a hearing on an application for a temporary variance on request of:
the applicant; or
an employee whom the temporary variance would affect.

section.section:
The Commissioner:
shall hold a hearing on each application for a permanent variance; and
if appropriate, shall conduct an inspection.
The Commissioner shall give employees whom the permanent variance would affect an opportunity to participate in the hearing.
